website_summaries.verdict: A compact, lightweight body with 4 interchangeable attachments that allow you to work in almost any situation imaginable.
pros: This unit fits comfortably in your hand and features a convenient battery charge indicator
The attachments allow you to drill at a 90 degree angle, perform offset driving for screws that are as close as 1/2-inch from a corner, and use high-torque hex-bits
cons: The two areas of concern on this model are the wobble in the chuck and the difficulty in removing the battery from the unit when it needs charging

customer_reviews.title: Low torque, awkward 90° adapter
customer_reviews.text: I often use this with its 90° adapter and Bosch's spade bits (from DSB5003) to get between closely spaced joists. First, the torque is lower than I expected considering the wondrous reviews others have given Bosch's 12V power tools. Second, the 90° adapter seems only to be able to click in at three angles, e.g., 120°, 240° and 0°/360°, but offset such that you'll never be able to hold the handle of the drill perpendicular to your work.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: 3 years warranty is a fraud!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to register my tool to get the warranty... it is an impossible-challenge ... the sites kick you out every 30 seconds saying "connection time out", overall expression like they don't want you to register the product guys really?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How to choose the right tool for you needs.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool. Well known Bosch quality combined with all these super useful attachments made a lot of my working projects lots easier. The price is also excellent, in Europe you buy it for 170Euro only with the right angle attachment, so words are useless. Battery life is very good at two amps, so you've got here a clear winner.
customer_reviews.author: Petru Kovacs

customer_reviews.title: Good for tight spaces and odd angles.  Holds Festool centrotec bits.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a big Festool driver with similar heads. Obviously not the same quality, but good for medium duty use. Anyway, there are so many great reviews, so no need to belabor. Power is appropriate to 12v tool class. However, just figured something out by accident (read a manual?). The right angle head seemed to go in only at odd angels, which was really annoying (and major flaw), until I realized that the head can turn freely, until you pull the locking collar into the body. Take a look at photos. It's why I wrote this review. Overall, very useful for those tight corners. Also, as an added bonus, it holds Festool centrotec bits.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Oatcake

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Tool
customer_reviews.text: This 5 in 1 kit is a pretty cool tool. The offset and right angle attachments are the most useful. If you already have an impact driver and drill, then the other attachments are less needed. However, it is nice to have all of them in the same set. The kit comes with two 2-Ah batteries and those charge fairly quickly and perform well. Overall a pretty well built, well thought out tool. It's especially good for those tight places like the inside edge where two boards meet or between two closely mounted studs.
customer_reviews.author: PresidentsDad

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I love this tool. The battery lasts forever and the tool has plenty of power. The assortment of heads is terrific to. Great to reach screws or drill a hole in a cramped location. The tool is lightweight and fits in your hand well. Now the thing isn’t designed for building a deck or running lag screws in 6x6’s but for what it’s designed for, you won’t find a more versatile drill/screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Millard

customer_reviews.title: Magic tool
customer_reviews.text: I love it because of its compact design and superb build quality. When you click the attached into the tool, It makes a satisfying thumping sound and when you lock it in place, the sound of click spells a snugly fit. I used the tool the very next day putting together my ping pong table which makes me appreciate it even more. It’s lightweight and size makes it a life saver for extended operation. The ability to use the offsetting attachment is god-sent which allows it to screw very close to obstacles like a raised edge. My regular Ryobi would have failed me by this time but not this Bosch tool.
customer_reviews.author: Will Yang

customer_reviews.title: Both my wife and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot review how the battery works for busting off rusty lug nuts, but this thing is awesome for 99% of household work. The head changes are super easy and the unit is small, but solid. I bought this over any other unit for two reasons: 1) the removable heads, which allow you to leave your drill chucked and your driver chucked and just change heads. It also is easier to store. 2) I ESPECIALLY liked the offset drive, which allows much better access to screws crowded next to something. Mine came with two batteries, which is great for pretty lengthy use. Lastly, the size and weight mean my wife can use comfortably, which’s means less work for me! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Factor

customer_reviews.title: One of the batteries arrived dead, can't be charged
customer_reviews.text: I tried calling Bosch's 1-800-number (advertised on amazon as 24/7) , got a nice person after a while, who told me she was forwarding my call. She did, to a tape that said "Outside of business hours". Will update. But this shouldn't happen. A battery, that by itself costs about $29, should have been tested. Shipping defective product costs a lot more downstream than to bin the part during manufacture. Battery part no. BAT414. Production code 3INR19/66 OM23-911011336
customer_reviews.author: roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Handy specialty drill
customer_reviews.text: The drill is handy to have for those special situations, I could not resist this purchase when I saw it being offered for a very good price. I probably would not have made the purchase if it were not for the price. I have used it a few times and it has performed very well. The case it comes in is not very accommodating for the accessories. I have a low to moderate need for this drill and it should serve me well. If you have a frequent or heavy need for this drill you may want to wait for the brushless version to reach the USA.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: the best drill if your weaker than most, have arthritis, or just do alot of Drilling
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my better half who was thinking of trying to find new Dewalt batteries! He needed the power to drill holes, and screws, No Hammerdrill needed, just a nice light, powerful drill... this is that! after watching a youtube video of a guy drilling 250 holes thru Alu covered fiberboard for a Vac-u-former on One Battery, I was sold! I don't need lighter, but I gotta say, Ill be retiring the Decade old Dewalt!
customer_reviews.author: Delmar T. Neeley

customer_reviews.title: If you think you need it, you do.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped it would be. I purchased it for a project that required the close operation the offset head provides (attaching a bar top with figure 8 fasteners) and it performed perfectly without damaging the supporting cabinet work. The heads change easily and the power is ample for most applications. I couldn’t be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Solid designed product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have an older model (without the exchangeable heads). Used it for 5 years and still going strong. I liked that the same product was being used in a different/same manner. The design is good except, there is no clip or holder for a few bits. I ended up gluing a super strong magnet to the back and this holds my bits while I’m using and when switching heads. Nice that it has an led for battery status. Bosch is solid equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Dfnsmn

customer_reviews.title: Needed to return due to damaged part
customer_reviews.text: One of the interchangeable heads arrived broken. Lock ring that holds it together was off and plastic ring where it should have been attached was damaged
customer_reviews.author: twolfy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kitchen installs/remodels and woodworking
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for kitchen installs/remodels and woodworking. The offset and 90 degree attachments are a life saver. Sure you can do the work without this set but it make the job more efficient and professional. This drill is far more powerful for the above jobs then you will need, I never wished it had more power. If you use it for its intended purpose its works as designed, I hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lawdog516

customer_reviews.title: Not an Impact Driver
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give less than 5 stars because it is a great tool. The only thing is it is not an impact driver. This is my fault for not looking harder at the description, it's just that when it said driver I assumed impact driver. That point aside, it really is a great little compact tool that I will still keep in go bag for small repairs when I leave the bigger tools at the shop.
customer_reviews.author: someone who cares

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I had previously looked at this product at a major hardware/lumber/appliance store and liked what I saw and already had several Bosh tools with the 12 volt battery which held up very well and needed something small to keep in the house in my craft room so found this here at a much better price and have been very pleased it does the job and very flexible , so if you are looking for a tool like this for around the house get it you will be glad you did...
customer_reviews.author: Houston D.

customer_reviews.title: Love how light it is
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger drill and an impact wrong/drill and i thought I didn't need it another one but the flexibility it gives and the portability compared to my other drills justifies the purchase, my wife loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this drill to have in my small travel trailer for extended trips AND so I wouldn't have to borrow my husbands cordless drill. Inevitably I need it when he is using his. This little thing is great. Sturdy, small, yet powerful enough to get things done. My husband thought I would be throwing money away on junk, but I did some research, and this drill set is highly rated for hard core do-it-yourselfers or light-duty professionals. Now the only problem is that my husband is always borrowing _my_ cordless drill! He says its got a little more power than his own. I'm totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but powerful with adapters for plenty of uses.
customer_reviews.text: Despite having the 18v drill/driver combo I got this set for more everyday jobs around the house. Best decision I could've made. This thing has plenty of power, is light weight comparatively, and the attachments make life so much easier, especially for tight spaces. The case is light-duty but more than serviceable for the uses. It has a light and the drill adapters/heads are easily attached/locked in place. Anyhow, if you need drill for around the house jobs this is your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Kawika K.

customer_reviews.title: Good warranty.
customer_reviews.text: The unit is very well design. Strong torque with lots of attachment heads. It saved me in a couple of occasions where space was tight. It is also small and compact so easy to use. Has enough torque for 90% of jobs I need. My unit stopped working after only 2 months. I called Bosch and they promptly replaced it with no questions. Great service. I like the 3 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I'm a residential electrician, and this tool is just about perfect for my job. It is light enough to carry on my tool belt most of the time, powerful enough to drill the occasional 7/8" hole through framing lumber, and versatile enough to get into most of the tightest spaces I have to work in. I do seldom use the attachments, but when I have had to use them they've performed perfectly and allowed me to leave the customer with a more pleasing end result than would have been feasible before. Highly recommend if you can catch it on sale, if not then either of it's twins (ps21, ps31) are just as powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lackluster power, no impact funtion.
customer_reviews.text: This kit works okay. The different head attachments are neat, but the impact function is missing and power is lackluster. I know that the kit is not brushless, but I was hoping that it has good enough power. Having own Milwaukee for many years, I got used to the raw impact driving power. This kit is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tickles

customer_reviews.title: hate
customer_reviews.text: The price is expensive and the quality is average. The origin is not Germany!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The size, balance, power, and flexible uses make for a superb drill.
customer_reviews.text: One of my hobbies is woodworking. During the two months I have been using this Bosch, it has become my favorite drill. The off-set head literally saved a project this week. The size, balance, power, and flexible uses make for a superb tool. I appreciate the quiet and capable motor as well. This Bosch is one of my favorite power tools.
customer_reviews.author: New Heart Man

customer_reviews.title: wonderful drill and the attachments have gotten me out of ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful drill and the attachments have gotten me out of some tight (literally) spots. Highly recommend and much cheaper than the Festool alternative
customer_reviews.author: Hankdoc

customer_reviews.title: Website for assistance is for appliances only.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a 12v cordless drill. One of the batteries is dead - will not take a charge. I called the 24/7 number listed by Amazon/Bosch but it is for appliances only...not for tools. The rep. I spoke with provided me with another number to call for support on power tools.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cordless screwdriver and all the options that come with it. I cant tell you how many times I've been working on a project with small spaces that my other screwdrivers just wont work because they are too big, but dont have that problem with this screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and capability for light-medium work!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with the quality of this tool! The body amd attachments are well-made and solid, but the weight is not too heavy. The various angle attachments work perfectly for a wide range of tasks. Keep in mind this is an electric screwdriver and does not have the power for really heavy drilling. But it's perfect to have in your tool kit if you don't always want to lug a heavier 20V drill and impact driver with you. Batteries also charge quickly with the included charger.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche Cribbs

customer_reviews.title: Interchangeable delight!
customer_reviews.text: This is another outstanding Bosch product, The drill is lightweight and powerful, very easy to hold. The different chucks are very easy to put on and take off. Had a small issue with drill bits coming out of the offset chuck, called Bosch and they sent me a new chuck. Superb customer service! I highly recommend this product and all the Bosch 12v line. Amazing craftsmanship
customer_reviews.author: D. Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for assembly
customer_reviews.text: This little tool is perfect for assembling pieces or just doing small little odd jobs around the house. Its not as cumbersome as my Ryobi and I certainly appreciate the attachments this one comes with. The right angle attachment alone is a must have. I often use this when I'm drilling pocketholes or if I need to get into a tight spot and need more torque than the little drill we keep in the toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Name-Classified

customer_reviews.title: Gets you out of this tight situations. Bosch quality all over it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for myself then shortly thereafter a set as a gift for my dad. I’m an admitted Bosch tool fan but that aside this is a nice piece of kit for those odd positions you sometimes need to get into. Solid build, kinda fun to use. My mind goes back to my Transformer toy days as a child (in a good way). 😄 Also I love these tool storage bags Bosch uses. A quarter of mine get handily repurposed for other job uses. Those blow molded plastic cases really irk me.
customer_reviews.author: T-77

customer_reviews.title: Great hand tool
customer_reviews.text: I like how light it is. As I've grown older, having a heavy tool in my hand makes doing projects difficult. This Bosch power tool gives me options. Sometimes, you don't have the room you want to finish the task. This gives tool gives me those options.
customer_reviews.author: G. B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Handles tight spots easily
customer_reviews.text: If you're child-proofing your home and need to drive screws into tight spots, this is the tool for you. The offset is absolute genius, the build quality is superb and the torque is excellent. Also has a 90-degree bend that makes life easy when working with minimal clearances. Not brushless, so absolutely not for use in an explosive environment.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Well built with good power and battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for a few months now on weekend projects and occasional service calls. It is very impressive and compact. This tool keeps up with my 18V Festool when it comes to driving screws. Bosch seems to be following Festool's lead in creating more integrated systems. Because of this I recommend purchasing and using the Bosch bit holders and holster with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: useful, good quality, but the battery is virtually impossible to remove
customer_reviews.text: I'm average-strength guy, and I cannot get those batteries out without large pliers. I have another driver and a drill that use those 12V batteries, and about 6 batteries, and most of them are like that. The picture shows how I remove the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this and he LOVES it. He has tried LOTS of other power drills/screwdrivers and this one is by FAR the best!! I highly recommend it!! The interchangeable heads are a game changer!!! Great tool for just about any job!!
customer_reviews.author: mairenagang

customer_reviews.title: Bosch cordless drill/driver
customer_reviews.text: This drill/driver is a very good product to date. I've only had the Bosch for a couple months, using it occasionally, but the quality is pretty apparent. The price is fair and it does exactly what I want it to do (very versatile). I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: popo22

customer_reviews.title: Battery charger DOA
customer_reviews.text: The battery charger was dead on arrival, the rest of the unit looks fine, but I wasn't able to properly test as I could not recharge the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan in buying a two in one tool, but I have been a Bosch user for over 30 years, they have always been good to me, I love this tool, it’s so easy to change parts, even easier than changing the lens on my Nikon. For 12 volts it’s powerful and almost lite as a feather. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Atkin

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool but not so good packaging design
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful German tool as always. Only wish the packaging design inside the soft bag could be better arranged and use more qualified material to fix the location of gears. So one star off.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: It's way better than expected. Beefy yet compact, solid and feels great with its weight. Was considering the newer 12V EC Brushless motor and the 18V versions. This is way cheaper, unbeatable value. I don't need higher torque or speed but compactness is a must. So this unit fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SKL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, but secretly I use it more. So light weight! And it fits my smaller hand. My husband has rotator issues and he uses this with ease. Definitely buy this! Everyone that uses it raves about it. Paid way less on Amazon than the store. I was ready to purchase in store, but checked Amazon first. Saved a bundle.
customer_reviews.author: HOLLY

customer_reviews.title: Quality, lightweight, durable.
customer_reviews.text: As always Bosch never let's you down. This drill is awesome. Very easy to remove and add accessories. Battery life is great, not as good as my brushless drill, but last long enough for any job. This is probably the most versatile drill you can own.
customer_reviews.author: Luisandamanda

customer_reviews.title: small and compact
customer_reviews.text: i'm an appliance tech and love bosch drills there small powerful been using these drills for about ten years cant beat them the only down fall is there like Gremlins don't get them wet.They do not like water but once you learn that and your careful were you set it down wile working your all set .the work i do a battery will last me about a week.Won't buy any other drill.
customer_reviews.author: mark cantrell

customer_reviews.title: I purchased one...loved it and bought a second!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep around the house for small fix-it projects. Personally I own 2 sets and carry one in my truck with automotive bits and the other at home with a bit set the works better for home projects. They are very wasy to use. My wife especially loves how she only needs one gun to do any small repairs around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Nick M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Drill Driver
customer_reviews.text: This has been fairly awesome so far. I've used most of it's various heads, and it works fantastic. Let's you get into tight spots to install Kreg screws, or work around roof rafters. Very cool.
customer_reviews.author: WoodWolfe

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: My first project: drill 40, 1/8" holes through 3" of untreated pine. No problems. Used 1/3 of battery capacity. I'll add to this review as I begin to use additional attachments.
customer_reviews.author: DougChoz

customer_reviews.title: Great for home projects
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 star but the bits fall out easily. Great battery life. Great for home projects . Plenty of power with average use. Not a professional strength product if that’s what you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Gia C.

customer_reviews.title: Light drill.  Not big power.
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful. Usually use by rigid 18v for mounting flatscreen TVs. This one did ok but won’t replace the big boy. Very light and easy to handle!
customer_reviews.author: Ilya R.

customer_reviews.title: A real multi tool in one
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I got. From doing stuff around the house to my car. The attachments make you confident to tackle any projects, whether you’re an avid diy person, a professional handyman, or an optimistic hobbyist, this is for you
customer_reviews.author: BEM

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: The product is made in Malaysia and appears to be up to Bosch standards. I wanted a right angle driver and with all the attachments this is much better buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN L SAUER

customer_reviews.title: Quite Versatile for home usage
customer_reviews.text: The connections easy to come loose during work. Other than that, it is a good design.
customer_reviews.author: tut

customer_reviews.title: Great drill set
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is incredible. Been using it for a couple hours over the span of a few weeks and still haven't even used half of one of the two batteries. Nice and compact so you can easily get it into smaller openings.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Bosch Power Tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He said it's the best tool he has ever owned . I don't have to listen to cursing and moaning any more , when doing household projects. Light weight adjustable in small spaces, simplifies jobs. Thinking of gifting more to family members.
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a nice drill/driver and the multi-heads is definitely a plus! Always had to struggle before with tough corners, under sinks, around cabinets, etc. Not any more this is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for small/medium jobs
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile tool with a small footprint. My coworker thought the attachments were a gimmick until he saw how useful they are, especially the 90 degree elbow. Batteries also last a good amount of time and I have yet to find a task that these can't complete.
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan Brutsky

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tools I own. It has enough power to make a hole and any light to medium jobs you can throw at it
customer_reviews.author: J-Ro

customer_reviews.title: No belt hook 😐😐😐😐😐
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice set of your a work bench person But if your a sparky and are used to having a belt hook like every other drill out there your outta luck I’m going back to the Milwaukee’s
customer_reviews.author: YouNeedLED

customer_reviews.title: This is what I was expect, great
customer_reviews.text: It was a smart buy, great quality, better pay more and get what you expect
customer_reviews.author: Shorena Dvali

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works well
customer_reviews.text: This drill driver works great. It's quiet and strong. The clutch works well to prevent stripping fasteners.
customer_reviews.author: Ben from VA

customer_reviews.title: Great for light to medium duty tasks
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I wanted a second screwdriver while installing a bunch of drawer slides. It’s lightweight and not super powerful, but as a second drill/driver it really works well. The interchangeable heads really helped.
customer_reviews.author: BoulderSteve

customer_reviews.title: “Oh my, BOSCH”!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first power tools from a pawnshop or was given hand me down tools by friends. I always wanted to own something new for once in my life, so I chose this brand “BOSCH” for it’s superb and unique features. I did my research by simply going online. The video reviews helped me out tremendously in making the decision in making this purchase. “BOSCH” rules when it comes to tools!!!
customer_reviews.author: SAL-SAL

customer_reviews.title: Extrimely useful in tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of the small size this is a very powerful tool, that provides easy access to tight spaces rather inaccessible with a regular screw gun. Extra battery and charger is a nice bonus to the whole package.
customer_reviews.author: MazBros

customer_reviews.title: One shop stop!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a very versatile tool for quick repairs. Great tool overall
customer_reviews.author: VicThor

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tool.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Bosch tools for many years and I am pleased with the quality of yet another Bosch.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Isbestor

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality replaces my 7.2 Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long and use poor replacement 7.2 Dewalt Batteries. This Bosch is so much better and I am so pleased about this drill!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Longmeadow, MA

customer_reviews.title: Quality, flexible drill much cheaper than Festool.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little drill. The clutch settings top out a little low in torque but it’s a nice drill. Light but still powerful. The different nose pieces makes it very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: JimD

customer_reviews.title: Very useful tool
customer_reviews.text: I like all the accessories that it includes also the power it has. Love it
customer_reviews.author: erik

customer_reviews.title: Little guy with a big heart
customer_reviews.text: Great for small drill holes and for screwing unscrewing and tightening up band clamps
customer_reviews.author: Alphonso T James

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool for small home tasks. I had the similar model for 4 years, then presented it to my father. Bought this one with additional adapters. Very useful for tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya Kolesnikov

customer_reviews.title: To of the Line
customer_reviews.text: This set will do everything you need it to do, with power to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffnick

customer_reviews.title: Fits in tight spots.
customer_reviews.text: This is one handy cordless drill kit to have. All the different adaptors in one kit is great. Being 12 volt allows it to be compact.
customer_reviews.author: Will C

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool
customer_reviews.text: This thing comes in handy . This drill is works well my go to for everyday DYI.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and Ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this set. He has bad shoulders and since this is light weight and ergonomic he is able to work with them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little tool
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little tool. Really helped when other drills just couldn’t reach. Is a little heavy but takes place of other tools so real space saver as well.
customer_reviews.author: pdorn77

customer_reviews.title: Small and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Small and light weight. Packs a good punch for it's size and it saved me out of some hard to reach drilling spaces already. I had it for a few months now and really love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: abel garcia

customer_reviews.title: I didn't receive a new item
customer_reviews.text: Box was ripped and previously opened. It was obviously a return. It's supposed to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: kikig

customer_reviews.title: Best tool I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best combo drill/impact driver ever! Ready t use right out of the box! It works excellent on all my projects at home and on the road!
customer_reviews.author: Rhiga37484

customer_reviews.title: A must have tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool has been used more than any other hand or power tool I own. Very versatile and well made. Strong enough to get most jobs done.
customer_reviews.author: Anderchuck

customer_reviews.title: Combo Set

customer_reviews.title: 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.text: Lots of torque and versatility. Love this drill. The only problem I have had is sometimes the high low setting will move in between gears in the case and if you don't catch it it will sound like the gears have sheared. Not a big problem just thought I would mention it.

product_meta.title: Bosch GSR12V-140FCB22 Cordless Electric Screwdriver 12V Kit - 5-In-1 Multi-Head Power Drill Set
product_meta.description: The Bosch 12V Max Flexi Click 5 In 1 Drill/Driver System is designed for professionals who want a high quality tool that redefines their limits to get the tough jobs done. At only 1.8 Lbs. and 265 In. Lbs. of torque, this robust drill/driver delivers the performance you expect in the size you want. It has two Speed settings, for quick jobs and precision work. It starts with a magnetic bit holder for basic driving. The four attachments – a locking bit holder, a key less chuck, an offset angle and a right angle– each attach to the tool securely and easily with the one click interface. The right angle attachment is for tight spaces, and it works with all three other adapters. The offset angle attachment delivers precise screw driving close to edges. Both of these attachments rotate to 16 positions without removing them. The locking bit holder.
feature_bullets: Versatile: The electric screwdriver's 5 in 1 design delivers outstanding versatility in a compact, high quality drill/driver; The kit includes a locking bit holder, a key less chuck, an offset angle and a right angle to attach to the tool with the one click interface

Convenient: The included key less chuck attachment provides locked in drilling for difficult materials; An LED light illuminates dark work areas effectively and afterglow function keeps the light on for 10 seconds after the tool is off
Secure: The kit’s locking bit holder attachment locks hex bits for security during high torque driving or drilling
Adjustable: The provided right angle attachment is designed for tight work spaces and works with the other three
Precision: The offset angle attachment offers precise screw driving very close to edges; Rotates to 16 positions without

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars470 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
